Header: President’s web page hackers released on bail
Content: The youths who hacked into president’s official web page were released on bail. The order was given after the two were produced before Colombo Chief Magistrate Gihan Pilapitiya. The 17-year-old student was released on two Rs. 1 million personal bail and the 26-year-old youth was released on Rs. 25,000 cash bail and four Rs. 1 million personal bail.
